name: Super Shogi 3: Kitaihei
overview: Super Shogi 3: Kitaihei ("Super Shogi 3: Chess Tranquility") is a shogi game for the Super Famicom and the third in I'Max's trilogy of shogi games for the system. In addition to standard shogi, the game also has a competitive four-player minigame that uses shogi pieces as well as a story mode that plays like an adventure game.
